channel.title: Commandswhere I can put someones name in
channel.description: For example, I have the command pushups but how would I make it so I can be like, ::pushups Timmy. Help me please.

item.title: Commandswhere I can put someones name in
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

depending on your source you need to string it…
example of a PI source string…

String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ", 2); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) {
